document.discussion_title: Drones, Beers, and Space City JS pre-pre-party - houston.js (Houston, TX) - Meetup
document.topic_text: 675 Bering Dr, Ste 725, Houston , TX ( map ) 29.761429 -95.478836 UPDATE: DRONEWORKS had to cancel, but we'll still have beers and just hang out. :) Parking is around back; a security guard is in the main lobby - he can let you up to floor 6. Let's get together for a Space City JS pre-pre-party – not a misspelling :) – and chat drones, have some lightning talks, and more! DRONEWORKS Studios is going to be joining us for a special demo of various drones they've developed in-house; experiences piloting and demonstrating the use of drones for geological, industrial, and media sectors; and lessons-learned surrounding the FAA drone regulations. See more about DRONEWORKS Studios at http://droneworksstudios.com . Join or login to comment. Hit enter to add your reply
